android.content.res

Class XResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.res.Resources
      • android.content.res.MiuiResources
        • android.content.res.XResources

  • public class XResources
extends MiuiResources
    Resources class that allows replacements for selected resources

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XResources.DimensionReplacement
      callback function for getDimension(int), getDimensionPixelOffset(int) and getDimensionPixelSize(int)
      static class  XResources.DrawableLoader
      callback function for getDrawable(int) and getDrawableForDensity(int, int)
      static class  XResources.ResourceNames 
      static class  XResources.XTypedArray
      TypedArray replacement that replaces values on-the-fly.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.res.Resources

        android.content.res.Resources.NotFoundException, android.content.res.Resources.Theme

      • getPackageName

        public java.lang.String getPackageName()
        Returns the name of the package that these resources belong to, or "android" for system resources.

      • getPackageNameDuringConstruction

        public static java.lang.String getPackageNameDuringConstruction()
        For a short moment during/after the creation of a new Resources object, it isn't an instance of XResources yet. For any hooks that need information about the just created object during this particular stage, this method will return the package name.

        Note: If you call this outside of getTopLevelResources(), it throws an IllegalStateException.

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.ThreadLocal<java.lang.Object> latestResKey)

      • hookLayout

        public XC_LayoutInflated.Unhook hookLayout(java.lang.String fullName,
                                  XC_LayoutInflated callback)
        See Also:
        hookLayout(String, String, String, XC_LayoutInflated)

      • hookLayout

        public XC_LayoutInflated.Unhook hookLayout(java.lang.String pkg,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  XC_LayoutInflated callback)
        Add a function to be called once a specific layout has been inflated.
        Parameters:
        pkg - Package, e.g. com.android.systemui
        type - Type (in this case always layout)
        name - Name of the resource (e.g. statusbar)
        callback - Handler to be called
